S1 E4

TV-PG D, L 21min | 2020

Thursdays 9:30/8:30c

Jackie and Elizabeth are scandalized when they find their mom's secret love letters that suggest she had an affair. Also, Javier takes an unexpected job as a painter. (TV-PG D, L) Air Date: Apr 23, 2020
